places_with_reviews.name: Masjid Daerah Bera (Darul Fikri)

reviews.text: Quite a spacious and big mosque for Bera district. The interior prayer hall is air conditioned, well taken care of, with 2 digital screen. Information about the mosque, person in charge, activities are all updated on the info board. Wifi access is also provided!
Comfortable District mosque but relatively small compare other district
Comfortable. Complete with solemnization room, seminar room, cafe, free WiFi for user and others.
Very big mosque and comfortable to pray.

Located at the junction of four traffic lights in Bandar Kerayong.  From the intersection if you are from Temerloh City, the mosque is located on the right.
This mosque is indeed large and comfortable, corresponding to its title as the Bera district mosque.
The prayer room is comfortable, there is a hall, dining room, toilets are well maintained, clean.
Entering the mosque area, the parking area is very wide and almost surrounds the mosque.  The women's prayer room is located at the top.

places_with_reviews.name: Bera Waterfront
places_with_reviews.address: 73, Kampung Mengkarak, 28300 Bandar Bera, Pahang, Malaysia

reviews.text: Relaxing place. Limited facilities. Many traders here. The night was quite quiet. Whatever it is, this is the best place to relax and calm your mind.

if you follow the route to go to bera, don't forget to stop at the stop to look at the river bera, there is a place to take pictures of memories here, stop for a moment and take a picture, the view of the river is beautiful
Nice river view. Small stalls selling air kelapa is really refreshing

Location between temerloh to bera town.  Interesting river views especially at dusk and night.
The disadvantage that can be improved is that street lights should be placed along this Bera Waterfront because at night the conditions are very dark, if there are many lights installed it will definitely add attraction to this place.
Public facilities such as toilets and surau should be provided to provide convenience to visitors from afar when stopping to relax here.

From Temerloh, a lovely 20 minute country ride fringing Sungai Pahang on your left, to this spot. Roads are being improved. Should hv riverboat tours for tourists. Quite new. No cafes, no toilet facilities. Soon to come, I hope.

places_with_reviews.name: Masjid Kg Tok Mengkarak
places_with_reviews.address: Kampung Mengkarak, 28350 Bandar Bera, Pahang, Malaysia

reviews.text: Small mosque but clean
Nice one
Clean and comfortable

A visitor-friendly mosque with a spacious parking lot, a comfortable lounge/porch. It is very suitable to be used as a stopover if passing the temerloh-triang road. The position of the mosque is very close to Bera Water front, about 150 meters away.
It is here in the village that this mosque has been rebuilt with new changes
